title: Unused local variables should be removed
summary: If a local variable is declared but not used, it is dead code and should be removed. Doing so will improve maintainability because developers will not wonder what the variable is used for.
root_cause: Variable declared but never referenced in scope
fix_steps:
1. Remove the unused variable declaration
2. Review code logic to ensure variable was not intended to be used
3. Consider using underscore prefix for intentionally unused variables
autofix_snippet:
# Remove unused variable
# del unused_var
# Or use underscore prefix: _unused_var = value
